DocAttribute.Name: Directrix
DocAttribute.Documentation: The curve used to define the sweeping operation. The solid is generated by sweeping a circular disk along the directrix.

DocAttribute.Name: Radius
DocAttribute.Documentation: The radius of the circular disk to be swept along the directrix.

DocAttribute.Name: InnerRadius
DocAttribute.Documentation: This attribute is optional, if present it defines the radius of a circular hole in the centre of the disk.

DocAttribute.Name: StartParam
DocAttribute.Documentation: The parameter value on the directrix at which the sweeping operation commences.

DocAttribute.Name: EndParam
DocAttribute.Documentation: The parameter value on the directrix at which the sweeping operation ends.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR1
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The directrix shall be a curve in three dimensional space.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR2
DocWhereRule.Documentation: If inner_radius exists then radius shall be greater than inner_radius.
